1974-2007 (Bulk 1980-1999)

Fales Library and Special Collections
Peter Lewis Allen Collection of Safe Sex Pamphlets
Allen, Peter L., 1957-
MSS.199
0.75 Linear Feet (1 box)
1974-2007 (Bulk 1980-1999) The Peter Lewis Allen Collection of Safe Sex Pamphlets contains pamphlets, brochures, postcards, and objects relating to sexual health issues from 1974-2007. These materials were produced and distributed in the United States, Latin America, and Europe. In addition to print materials the collection houses several condoms and safe sex kits, and a t-shirt.
Provenance
The materials in the collection were amassed by Peter Lewis Allen, Ph.D. The collection was donated by Peter Allen in 2007.
Access Restrictions
Materials are open without restrictions. Please contact the Fales Library and Special Collections, fales.library@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.
Use Restrictions
Copyright (or related rights to publicity and privacy) for materials in this collection was not transferred to New York University. Permission to use materials must be secured from the copyright holder. Please contact the Fales Library and Special Collections, fales.library@nyu.edu, 212-998-2596.
Biographical Note
Peter Lewis Allen, Ph.D. is a scholar and author whose interests include culture, history, and sexuality. Among his publications is The Wages of Sin: Sex and Disease, Past and Present (Chicago: University of Chicago Press, 2000).
Scope and Content Note
The collection is organized into two series containing the materials collected by Peter Lewis Allen. The materials in Series I include brochures, pamphlets, postcards, and magazines from the 1980s and 1990s. Series II contains condoms and safe sex kits as well as a t-shirt. The materials focus on HIV/AIDS prevention but also include subjects such as safe sex and STD prevention, pregnancy, abstinence, drug use, teenagers and sex, menopause, and birth control. These materials were in the main published and distributed by health clinics and organizations such as Gay Men's Health Crisis and Planned Parenthood. The collection also includes several international pamphlets from Europe and Latin America. Languages include English, Spanish, French, and Dutch.
Arrangement
The collection is divided into two series. Series I: Pamphlets and Brochurescontains the bulk of the collection. Series II: Physical Objectscontains condoms, safe sex kits and a t-shirt.
The folders are arranged chronologically.
Missing Title
Series I: Pamphlets, Brochures and Related Material
Series II: Physical Objects
Preferred Citation
Published citations should take the following form:
Identification of item, date (if known); The Peter Lewis Allen Collection of Safe Sex Pamphlets; MSS 199; box number; folder number; Fales Library and Special Collections, New York University Libraries.

Series I: Pamphlets, Brochures, and related materials.
Scope and Contents note
This series contains Peter Allen's collection of brochures, pamphlets, postcards, and magazines from the 1980s and 1990s. The materials focus on HIV/AIDS prevention but also include subjects such as safe sex and STD prevention, pregnancy, abstinence, drug use, teenagers and sex, menopause, and birth control. These materials were published and distributed by health clinics and organizations such as Gay Men's Health Crisis and Planned Parenthood. Many of the brochures are from Europe and Latin America.
